Class PlantService

java.lang.Object
com.landrycarroll.leaflog.plantmanagement.services.PlantService
@Service public class PlantService extends Object
PlantService contains the core business logic for managing plants in the system. It provides operations to create, read, update, delete, and bulk import Plant entities.

This service acts as an intermediary between controllers and the PlantRepository.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<Plant> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all plants in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of Plant objects

    • findById

      public Plant findById(UUID id)
      Finds a plant by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the plant
      Returns:
      the corresponding Plant entity
      Throws:
      PlantException.PlantNotFound - if no plant is found with the given ID

    • createPlant

      public Plant createPlant(PlantDto.Request request)
      Creates a new Plant from the provided DTO request.
      Parameters:
      request - the plant creation data
      Returns:
      the created Plant entity

    • updatePlant

      public Plant updatePlant(UUID id, PlantDto.Request request)
      Updates an existing plant with the given ID using new data. If no existing plant is found, a new one is created and saved.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the plant to update
      request - the updated plant data
      Returns:
      the updated (or newly created) Plant entity

    • deletePlant

      public boolean deletePlant(UUID id)
      Deletes the plant with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the plant to delete
      Returns:
      true if the operation completes without exception

    • markAsWatered

      public Plant markAsWatered(UUID id)
      Marks the specified plant as watered by updating its last watered timestamp.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the plant to mark as watered
      Returns:
      the updated Plant entity
      Throws:
      PlantException.PlantNotFound - if the plant does not exist

    • bulkCreate

      public Map<String,Object> bulkCreate(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Performs bulk creation of plants from a file. The file is expected to contain lines with the following format: 
       name - species - wateringFrequency - notes
      Parameters:
      file - a MultipartFile containing plant data
      Returns:
      a Map with keys "plants" (List<Plant>) and "errors" (List<String>)
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if file processing fails
